snippet: Evan Turner scored 22 points and grabbed 10 rebounds, and Tony Wroten added 18 points as the Philadelphia 76ers cruised to a 94-79 victory at home over the Cleveland Cavaliers.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Philadelphia 76ers beat Cleveland Cavaliers, 94-79; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Evan Turner scored 22 points and grabbed 10 rebounds, and Tony Wroten added 18 points as the Philadelphia 76ers cruised to a 94-79 victory at home over the Cleveland Cavaliers.

headline.main: Sixers Spoil Bynum’s Return to Philadelphia
headline.print_headline: Sixers Spoil Bynum’s Return to Philadelphia
